H0.text: Which is the only Semitic language that is an official language of the EU. Arabic

H1.text: Which is the only Semitic language that is an official language of the EU. Hebrew

H2.text: Which is the only Semitic language that is an official language of the EU. Amharic

H3.text: Which is the only Semitic language that is an official language of the EU. Maltese

A4.text: It is the only official Semitic and Afroasiatic language of the European Union.

A5.text: It is the only Semitic language written in the Latin script.
